messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 545 - Creepy Doctor
messages.msgSnippet: I had the same experience with the last two doctors and will not go to a doctor unless he is homeschool friendly it was a terrible experience for my kids.  I
messages.messageBody:
I had the same experience with the last two doctors
and will not go to a doctor unless he is homeschool
friendly it was a terrible experience for my kids. I
also will not leave them alone in a doctor's office.
When they start on the homeschooling thing I ask them
what does this have to do with why they are in here.
I am a little protective about it because we faced
alot of verbal abuse about our homeschooling by the
neighbor kids where we use to live.

Leslie
